import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* ---------- NAVBAR ---------- */}

Aptitude Preparation

{/* ---------- INTRO SECTION ---------- */}

Welcome to the Aptitude Preparation platform! Here you can sharpen your reasoning, quantitative, and verbal skills with interactive practice tests. Get ready to improve your problem-solving ability and prepare for placement exams with confidence.

{/* ---------- SYLLABUS SECTION ---------- */}

Syllabus

{/* Card 1 */}

Reasoning

Covers logical reasoning, puzzles, series, and analytical problems to boost critical thinking.

{/* Card 2 */}

Quantitative

Learn topics like arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and data interpretation for quantitative aptitude.

{/* Card 3 */}

Verbal

Enhance your communication through grammar, comprehension, and vocabulary practice tests.

); }; export default Home;
